title: Can't play anymore "Bad Image"
body:
Hello,

I haven't been able to play league the past few weeks. When a game is about to launch, i get a "Bad Image" error saying d3dx9_39.dll is not designed to run on windows, or contains an error.

Things I've Tried:
- Re-installed League three times
- Re-downloaded DirectX 9
- Downloaded and replaced d3dx9_39.dll
- Updated graphics drivers
- Updated windows
- Ran as administrator
- Used league Repair function
- Tried with and without alpha client

Any help would be much appreciated, i'm not sure what to try next. If I don't find a solution soon i may just have to uninstall, constant crashes are such a nuisance. My computer exceeds the recommended specs, and ran the game fine until a recent update. Help please!

replies.body: It sounds like a driver failure issue, so it's interesting replacing it wasn't able to solve it.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your case individually.  Also grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach some logs for more context.  We'll get back to you!
